alert.note: Alert for Carson; Hartley; Hutchinson; Moore; Oldham; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:23PM CDT until July 02 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 622 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Cactus to 7 miles northwest of Four Way to 12 miles southwest of Channing, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dumas, Borger, Cactus, Fritch, Sunray, Stinnett, Channing, Sanford, Valley De Oro, Boys Ranch, Pringle, Four Way, Masterson and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Hartley; Hutchinson; Moore; Oldham; Potter
